metadata.name: 8 Billion People (1 of 1 moment captured realtime)
metadata.description:
This is one of one moment when human population crossed 8 billion in population on earth and now is forever digitized in form of a time capsule when this happened.
The number might be huge but we are still insignificant compared to the whole cosmos and we should be humble about it.

The timestamp of that very moment is :
11:59:59 15th November 2022 Dubai Time
23:59 14th November 2022 LA Time
02:59 15th November 2022 New York Time
07:59 15th November 2022 London Time
06:59 15th November 2022 Paris Time
09:59 15th November Kyiv Time
15:59 15th November 2022 Beijing Time
16:59 15th November 2022 Tokyo Time
